description: couple engaged in intercourse; woman attempts to write with a brush on a scroll of paper; woman wears a pink kimono with dark pink flowers; man wears a red and orange checked kimono; text middle of right edge and below scroll of paper in LLQ
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: Writing a Letter, No. 8 from Twelve Bouts in the Way of Love (Shikidō torikumi jūniban)
